participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, Emily enjoys sharing her passions and connecting with others over common interests.
participant_1.background: My MacBook Pro is always there for me when I need to work on my dog blog. my favorite musical is hamilton. my dad is an airline pilot. I enjoy my work as a software engineer, but it can be stressful. I want to get married again.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nostalgic, Ryan finds comfort in the past and enjoys discussing timeless themes in movies.
participant_2.background: My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels. my mother was born in ireland. I work at mcdonald s. I like to watch old movies from my childhood to feel like a kid again. I have not been on a date since high school.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going well so far. Thanks for asking!
What are you up to today?
I'm watching some movies to feel like a kid again.
That sounds fun! What kind of movies?
I'm watching some old Disney movies.
Nice! I love Disney movies.
Me too! They always make me feel happy.
What are some of your favorite Disney movies?
My favorite Disney movie is The Little Mermaid.
That's a great movie! I love Ariel.
Me too! She's so brave and adventurous.
What are some of your other favorite Disney movies?
I also love Beauty and the Beast, Cinderella, and Snow White.
Those are all great movies! I love them too.
I'm glad! I love talking about Disney movies.
Me too! They're so much fun to watch and talk about.
I know! I'm so glad I found someone who loves Disney movies as much as I do.
Me too! We should watch some Disney movies together sometime.
That would be so much fun! I would love that.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Okay! Thanks
